description: Numbers n such that 60*R_n + 7 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (20*10^n+1)/3 is prime.
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 66...667.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 09 2000
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 22 2003
84238 from Serge Batalov, Jul 06 2009 confirmed as next term by _Ray Chandler_, Feb 23 2012
